entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 1:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
